page.title: 11CLUBS (NON_UNIFORMED)
page.content: A{Keep fit group}meets in the village hall on Tuesday evenings for 1\ hours .It costs Â£1.Ann Warwick,the teacher begins the session with warm up exercises before tackling more strenuous work. Mr Body runs a{youth club}on Wednesday evenings in the village hall.Games available include snooker, pool and table tennis.Refreshments are available. The village{playing fields}are on Ashby Road.The appararatus includes two childrens' climbing frames, some swings and a big slide.A pavilion which used to be uesd by the youth club is now used mainly as a changing room for cricket and football teams. The village does not boast a football team at present.
